Articles.Content:
Can\'t go to sleep every night lately without dreaming about the far-fetched multiplayer...

Sigh, this is the biggest setback after realizing what reality is; number two on my list just behind beautiful colorful ponies.

But the days will go on... often with explosions...! 8)
Good gravy, we need rules about signature sizes.

Well I guess...

*Puts sun glasses on*

It\'s a Mad World.

There is no sleep; there is only SCP-966.

@Foamy: At least it\'s a PNG...
Since we don\'t live inside a black hole, we have to obey the laws of physics. And that\'s why reality isn\'t awesomer.

Since we don\'t live inside a black hole, we have to obey the laws of physics. And that\'s why reality isn\'t awesomer.

Screw gravity! FWEEEEEEP
We want multiplayer! Now! Or possibly in 1.15!

Stop saying 'WE WANT THIS'. The developers are not idiots, they read what you want and respond. Just don\'t be impatient. Developing games takes time. They might get around to it, and if they do, they will do it in there own time. But coding a multiplayer for this game would be harder than minecraft.

We want multiplayer! Now! Or possibly in 1.15!

We don\'t like your kind around here. Go somewhere else and demand something from good people. The developers don\'t even have to implement things that people want. They could completely ignore the community\'s like Notch or Gabe N.

We don\'t like your kind around here. Go somewhere else and demand something from good people. The developers don\'t even have to implement things that people want. They could completely ignore the community\'s like Notch or Gabe N.

'Or possibly in 1.15'

You may want to fix your Humormeter.

This reminds me of when minecraft didnt have multiplayer.

When we finally got it IT WAS SHIT AND WASNT FIXED FOR MANY UPDATES AT A TIME >

I would imagine harv and the team (forget company name) would do a better job of that.

This reminds me of when minecraft didnt have multiplayer.

When we finally got it IT WAS SHIT AND WASNT FIXED FOR MANY UPDATES AT A TIME >

I would imagine harv and the team (forget company name) would do a better job of that.

Company is Squad.

Whoa whoa guys, he was kidding. He said '1.15' meaning no rush, you have bigger things to implement, which is entirely true.

And in my defense I was not forcefully demanding multiplayer, I simply said it would be nice.

But the days will go on... often with explosions...! - I meant that with or without MP, KSP will never get old!

Need to replace the batteries on your 'Humorameter' guys!

Need to replace the batteries on your 'Humorameter' guys!

Mine\'s solar powered
